html:
Filling every inch of my body
Burning inside
Fooling me to the limit
Pleasureful poison
Killing me slowly
Silently cutting my throat
Not in hurry
I pay for it
I pay for my own demise
Just like my father
And people before him
The legal intoxicator
Known by primal tribes
Gift of the nature
Godsent
Addicting to the bone
title: Alcohol
